CommunicateAction.name: about
CommunicateAction.desc: The subject matter of the content.

CommunicateAction.name: inLanguage
CommunicateAction.desc: The language of the content or performance or used in an action. Please use one of the language codes from the IETF BCP 47 standard. See also availableLanguage.

CommunicateAction.name: recipient
CommunicateAction.desc: A sub property of participant. The participant who is at the receiving end of the action.

CommunicateAction.name: language
CommunicateAction.desc: A sub property of instrument. The language used on this action.
